Learn about

Tuson

Tuson Corporation is a well-established company that is always looking for new partners sharing our vision of growth. We provide parts and products to the Agricultural, Construction, Automotive and Transportation, Aerospace, and recently 3D printing industries.
Tuson Corporation is a global company manufacturing in the Pacific Rim. Tuson is always striving to improve processes and capabilities to provide superior service and high quality products at competitive prices.
Learn more
What We DO

MANUFACTURE FOR THE WORLD

Global Capacity

Several wholly owned Manufacturing locations in the Pacific Rim and USA.

MACHINING AND ASSEMBLY

With over 100 machines and 200,000 sq.ft. split between our facilities, we have the capability to finish high quality, complex parts at high quantities as well as assemble.

ISO Certified

We maintain global standards of excellence. Need specific certifications for your project? No problem.

USA Facility

Cost savings from products overseas without long lead times after initial ramp up.

Just in Time

On average, 99% on time delivery on thousands of part numbers.

Supply Chain Management

Advanced logistical concepts Kanban, vendor managed inventory, EDI, consignment.

Testimonials

Tuson’s staff was able to take our rough drawing and transform it into a high-quality part. Not only that, their manufacturing facility was able to produce 20,000 parts and ship them to our facility 55 days later!
– David Yardley, Automobile Lighting Component Manufacturer
